creator: patjlm@online.fr
text:
It would be nice to be able to specify the SQL output encoding in the <sql> task.
There is already an 'encoding' attribute, but it is used only when loading input
script(s).
I guess it would be better to have a second attribute 'outputencoding' to allow
different inbound and outbound encoding.
<concat> already has such an attribute.

Sorry, I refreshed the page, which created this new record....

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 39541 ***
creator: patjlm@online.fr
